REM CONFIG CRC IS 6586
HW_RESET_I2C,00,
SLEEP,00,2000,
NCI_CORE_RESET,00,
NCI_CORE_INIT,0000,
SLEEP,00,200
REM RESET THE CUSTOMER FIELD
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040006010008000000000000a5a5
SLEEP,00,200
REM HARDWARE CONFIGURATION
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040002010024201204138801F404000406FF08020305C600000500000000000000200406530000000089
SLEEP,00,200
REM Writing CustomA RF Parameters
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,
REM Writing CustomB RF Parameters
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040010010154C059D0ED00040242040402420303142D3D3D3D3D3D3D3D2C2C2C74000000000000005858000000000000000000000000404040E04040404040404081949444959595450000000000000000000000000000000000
REM Set DPC table
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000301004AFD064D079F07EF073F089208E208310974098909890989098909890989098909FF08FF08FF08FF08FF0835038603D70327047804C90419056A05BB050B065C06500050005000FFFFFF0D
SLEEP,00,200
REM UICC CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000A01001A40003C3C04B027100AF007D003E807D00064271003E832C81964
SLEEP,00,200
REM SE CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000B01001A40041E1E04B027100AF007D003E807D00064271003E832C81964
SLEEP,00,200
REM IOT CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000801000CDF01FF000000C1C2C3003D00
SLEEP,00,200
REM ANTENNA CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,0400090100200000E10BB801B5FFEC0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
SLEEP,00,200
REM NFCC CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,0400010100052057000606
SLEEP,00,200
REM WRITE CONFIGURATION CRC IN THE CUSTOMER FIELD
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,0400060100080000000000006586
SLEEP,00,200
HW_RESET_I2C,00,
SLEEP,00,2000,
NCI_CORE_RESET,00,
NCI_CORE_INIT,0000,
REM MATCHING ;69.5;3.7;70;Differential;Yes;15;560;No;No;ANT;1500;4.7;78;100;1500;77;DNP;150
